titles.title: Congratulating the Project Management Institute on the 50th anniversary of its founding.
Congratulating the Project Management Institute on the 50th anniversary of its founding.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the history of the Project Management Institute, commends it for reaching and supporting professionals around the world, and congratulates it on the 50th anniversary of its founding.
